title: "AI algorithms trained on fundus photographs infer self-reported race"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms trained on fundus photographs infer the self-reported race (SRR) of infants, regardless of whether the images contain color, according to a study published online May 4 in JAMA Ophthalmology."
